Introduction
============

Please read plugin documentation on it's `home page`_. This package add Plone 
integration to Javascript and CSS registry only.

Don't forget to use 'jq' variable instead of $ in custom Plone JS.

Gritter plugin was developed by `Jordan Boesch`_.


.. _`home page`: http://boedesign.com/blog/2009/07/11/growl-for-jquery-gritter/
.. _`Jordan Boesch`: http://boedesign.com
